Job Description: Dear Aspirants,Greetings from BCT Consulting!We are looking for "Java Stack Developer" with World's Leading client based at Chennai,Taramani.Expereince : 3 Years - 12YearsWork Location : Chennai,Taramani (currently will be WFH)Qualification: Any GraduateJob Role : Java Stack DeveloperJob Description:Expert on Java 8 and above, Oracle/PostgreSql database and Unix Shell ScriptingHands-on experience with various Java / Web technologies and frameworks: Spring (Core, Security, MVC, SpringBoot), JPA, Hibernate, REST API, Maven, Junit test, Mockito;Good exposureon various web technologies: Angular, Typescript, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Vanilla JavascriptUnderstanding of XML and related technologyUnderstanding of IBM MQ and related messaging technologyGood practical knowledge of design of RDBMS and SQLWorking knowledge of DevOps tools (Git, Jenkins, Sonar, Nexus Artifcatory)Knowledge about containers and virtual machines including Docker, Kubernetes, etc. (Nice to have)Understanding of Agile methodologies (Good to have)Interested candidates can share your updates resume to shaikh.subani@bct-consulting.com
